dmca.title: Your illegal activity having stolen my copyrighted web site design
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Cheryl Carnright [mailto:cheryl@carnrightdesign.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 29, 2005 9:05 AM
To: wyhspace@wyhspace.com; jyu1108@hotmail.com; abuse@theplanet.com;
copyright@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com; promote@cybrconsult.com;
sysop@emcs.net]
Subject: Your illegal activity having stolen my copyrighted web site design



          

To Whom It May Concern:
 
It has come to my attention that you have stolen my site and it's design. I
created every single one of the images and I can prove it. I created the
intellectual content and I created the KISS theme.
 
What's even more astonishing is that you're using my web portfolio as yours
as well as claiming my alliances are yours. Take this down today or I will
be forced to proceed with legal action against you and contact the top
search engines, which will result in costing you money and ruining your
name.
 
I don't know why you did this but it is highly unethical. Contacting you
this way is the first step. I'm doing it this way just in case you don't
know the copyright laws. However, if you do know them and intentionally did
this anyway, there will be consequences.
 
Take it down today or I WILL take further action.
 
Cheryl Carnright
Carnright Design
www.carnrightdesign.com
